job_details.Functieomschrijving:
+ Gross monthly salary between EUR 5,115 and EUR 7,308 (scale 10) for a 36 hour week
          + Thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance
          + 11% Employee Benefit Budget
          + EUR 1,400 development budget per year
          + Hybrid working: balance between home and office work (possible for most roles)
          + A pension, for which you can set the maximum amount of your personal contribution
       Are you comfortable building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions as a full-stack software engineer?
       Good! Then read on...
       You and your job
       We need your help to design, build and run groundbreaking GenAI solutions that are as valuable for our customers to use as they are fun for us to develop. As a Full Stack Engineer you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsible for your solutions.
       Practical examples
          + Work directly with (internal) customers to learn how processes and systems work.
          + Design and build responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions for millions of customers.
          + Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
          + Pair-program with team members to solve critical or complex problems.
       Facts & figures
          + 36 or 40 hours a week.
          + Mostly greenfields, little legacy.
          + 43,822 Rabobank colleagues around the world.
       Top responsibilities
          + Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions.
          + Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
          + Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders so we can improve together.
       We believe that bringing together people's differences is what makes us an even better bank. Talking of Rabobank: We are a Dutch bank that operates in 38 countries for over 9,5000,000 customers. Together with these customers, our members and partners we stand side by side to create a world in which everyone has access to enough healthy food. In the Netherlands we work to create a country in which people are happy with how they live, work and do business.
       Within Rabobank, Analytics Accelerators is an ambitious department that aims to mix in a healthy dose of experience, innovation and creativity in order to develop innovative products and services. We focus on fast learning, delivering value quickly and being more effective. As a team, you work on clear goals and continuously see the results of your (team) efforts., + You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions on rabobank.jobs/nl/veelgestelde-vragen.
          + A security check is part of the process.
          + We respect your privacy.
       #LI-AL2
       Applying In 5 steps
       We'd like to get to know you.
       Step 1 Applying
       Thanks for applying! We consider all the CVs and covering letters that we receive. After the closing date, you will hear from us as soon as possible.
       Step 2 First interview
       Usually you'll be meeting with your (potential) team leader and an immediate (future) colleague. We are keen to get a sense of whether you are a good fit for the position and our team. And you probably have a lot of questions too.
       Step 3 Second interview
       We want to speak to you a second time. In this online meeting, we will delve deeper into the details of what the job entails. Another colleague will often join the interview too.
       Step 4 Offer
       If you are a good match for us and we're a good match for you, then you'll receive a good offer by email. Some positions require you to undergo further assessment first.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Engineer

+ Gross monthly salary between EUR 5,115 and EUR 7,308 (scale 10) for a 36 hour week
          + Thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance
          + 11% Employee Benefit Budget
          + EUR 1,400 development budget per year
          + Hybrid working: balance between home and office work (possible for most roles)
          + A pension, for which you can set the maximum amount of your personal contribution
       Are you comfortable building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions as a full-stack software engineer?
       Good! Then read on...
       You and your job
       We need your help to design, build and run groundbreaking GenAI solutions that are as valuable for our customers to use as they are fun for us to develop. As a Full Stack Engineer you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsible for your solutions.
       Practical examples
          + Work directly with (internal) customers to learn how processes and systems work.
          + Design and build responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions for millions of customers.
          + Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
          + Pair-program with team members to solve critical or complex problems.
       Facts & figures
          + 36 or 40 hours a week.
          + Mostly greenfields, little legacy.
          + 43,822 Rabobank colleagues around the world.
       Top responsibilities
          + Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions.
          + Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
          + Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders so we can improve together.
       We believe that bringing together people's differences is what makes us an even better bank. Talking of Rabobank: We are a Dutch bank that operates in 38 countries for over 9,5000,000 customers. Together with these customers, our members and partners we stand side by side to create a world in which everyone has access to enough healthy food. In the Netherlands we work to create a country in which people are happy with how they live, work and do business.
       Within Rabobank, Analytics Accelerators is an ambitious department that aims to mix in a healthy dose of experience, innovation and creativity in order to develop innovative products and services. We focus on fast learning, delivering value quickly and being more effective. As a team, you work on clear goals and continuously see the results of your (team) efforts., + You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions on rabobank.jobs/nl/veelgestelde-vragen.
          + A security check is part of the process.
          + We respect your privacy.
       #LI-AL2
       Applying In 5 steps
       We'd like to get to know you.
       Step 1 Applying
       Thanks for applying! We consider all the CVs and covering letters that we receive. After the closing date, you will hear from us as soon as possible.
       Step 2 First interview
       Usually you'll be meeting with your (potential) team leader and an immediate (future) colleague. We are keen to get a sense of whether you are a good fit for the position and our team. And you probably have a lot of questions too.
       Step 3 Second interview
       We want to speak to you a second time. In this online meeting, we will delve deeper into the details of what the job entails. Another colleague will often join the interview too.
       Step 4 Offer
       If you are a good match for us and we're a good match for you, then you'll receive a good offer by email. Some positions require you to undergo further assessment first.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and running 'GenAI solutions' using generative techniques. It highlights end-to-end responsibility for these solutions, including design, development, and deployment, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.

evidence.phrase: Work directly with (internal) customers to learn how processes and systems work.
evidence.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand customer needs and existing business processes to inform the development of GenAI solutions.

evidence.phrase: Design and build responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions for millions of customers.
evidence.justification: This highlights the need to consider business value, cost-effectiveness, and customer impact when designing solutions.

evidence.phrase: We are a Dutch bank that operates in 38 countries for over 9,5000,000 customers. Together with these customers, our members and partners we stand side by side to create a world in which everyone has access to enough healthy food. In the Netherlands we work to create a country in which people are happy with how they live, work and do business.
evidence.justification: This provides context about the business domain (banking, food security) and its mission, which the GenAI solutions are intended to support.

evidence.phrase: Analytics Accelerators is an ambitious department that aims to mix in a healthy dose of experience, innovation and creativity in order to develop innovative products and services. We focus on fast learning, delivering value quickly and being more effective.
evidence.justification: This describes the department's business goals and approach, which the role contributes to.

evidence.phrase: building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: Directly mentions 'GenAI solutions', implying work with generative models.

evidence.phrase: groundbreaking GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: Indicates the development and implementation of generative AI models and applications.

evidence.phrase: Design and build responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: This involves the core process of creating and adapting generative AI models for specific business needs.

evidence.phrase: Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions.
evidence.justification: This encompasses the entire lifecycle of generative AI models, from initial design to production deployment.

evidence.phrase: Full Stack Engineer
evidence.justification: The job title itself implies a broad range of software development responsibilities, including front-end and back-end.

evidence.phrase: building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions as a full-stack software engineer
evidence.justification: Highlights the role of a software engineer in constructing the complete system around GenAI.

evidence.phrase: As a Full Stack Engineer you will join a multi-disciplinary team where you will have end-to-end responsible for your solutions.
evidence.justification: Indicates responsibility for the entire software development lifecycle of the solutions.

evidence.phrase: Design and build responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: This involves the practical implementation and coding of the GenAI solutions.

evidence.phrase: Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
evidence.justification: Suggests building robust, scalable software components that can be integrated into larger systems.

evidence.phrase: Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions.
evidence.justification: Covers the full spectrum of software development activities for the GenAI solutions.

evidence.phrase: run groundbreaking GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: Implies responsibility for the operational aspects of deployed GenAI solutions.

evidence.phrase: Design, build, test, deploy and run high quality and highly scalable GenAI solutions.
evidence.justification: The 'deploy and run' aspects directly relate to MLOps and productionizing models.

evidence.phrase: Contribute to the relentless automation of the above activities.
evidence.justification: Automation of deployment and operational tasks is a key component of MLOps.

evidence.phrase: GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: This term directly refers to applications built using generative AI models.

evidence.phrase: building all components of our next-level GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: While not explicitly named, building 'components' for GenAI solutions typically involves using frameworks and libraries.

evidence.phrase: Work directly with (internal) customers to learn how processes and systems work.
evidence.justification: Requires communication to understand customer needs and business context.

evidence.phrase: Pair-program with team members to solve critical or complex problems.
evidence.justification: Directly indicates collaboration and pair programming.

evidence.phrase: Give and receive help from peers, experts and stakeholders so we can improve together.
evidence.justification: Highlights the importance of collaboration and knowledge sharing within a team and with stakeholders.

evidence.phrase: you will join a multi-disciplinary team
evidence.justification: Implies working with individuals from different backgrounds and expertise.

evidence.phrase: next-level GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: Suggests working with cutting-edge technology that requires continuous learning.

evidence.phrase: Analytics Accelerators is an ambitious department that aims to mix in a healthy dose of experience, innovation and creativity in order to develop innovative products and services. We focus on fast learning, delivering value quickly and being more effective.
evidence.justification: The department's focus on 'fast learning' and innovation implies a need for adaptability.

evidence.phrase: solve critical or complex problems.
evidence.justification: Directly states the need to solve complex problems.

evidence.phrase: Design and build responsible and cost effective GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: Requires problem-solving to balance functionality, responsibility, and cost.

evidence.phrase: end-to-end responsible for your solutions.
evidence.justification: Implies taking ownership and solving issues that arise throughout the solution lifecycle.

evidence.phrase: groundbreaking GenAI solutions
evidence.justification: Suggests a need for innovative thinking and development.

evidence.phrase: end-to-end responsible for your solutions.
evidence.justification: Clearly indicates ownership and responsibility for the developed solutions.

evidence.phrase: Convert these generic parts to re-usable building blocks used by 1000+ tech teams.
evidence.justification: This task requires initiative and a forward-thinking approach to create widely applicable components.

evidence.phrase: Analytics Accelerators is an ambitious department that aims to mix in a healthy dose of experience, innovation and creativity
evidence.justification: The department's description emphasizes innovation and ambition, aligning with this skill.
